channel.title: Projects on Amul Vaibhav
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Amul Vaibhav

item.title: Project II: Exploratory Data Analysis
item.description: Cleaned & analyzed data over 5.5M rows containing 15 columns using Pandas Created visualizations (scatter plots, WordCloud, PairPlot etc.) using Seaborn, matplotlib & Plotly Discovered that most of Tweets are from Mumbai, India during IPL 2020 season. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project I: WEB Scrapping
item.description: Scraped Movies/Series from the TMBD website using Requests& BeautifulSoup4 Built Functions such as get_topic_page(), Ratings(),movie_url() to scrape movies name, Ratings, URL of the website, Date of Release etc. Stored data consisting of 100+ rows x 5 columns and into Movies.csv Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project IV: Machine Learning
item.description: Cleaned & analyzed retail store dataset with 420,000+ rows &16 columns to predict weekly sales. Trained linear models, random forests, and gradient boosted trees using scikit-learn &XGBoost Achieved a weighted mean absolute error of $2,487, landing in the top 25% on Kaggle. Link to GitHub Repository

item.title: Project III: Tableau
item.description: Analyzed the dataset of different Teams containing different players using Pivot Tables, VLOOKUP in Excel, Sheets Loaded the dataset in tableau and created a dashboard having map, bar plot, packed bubbles etc Discovered that the Real Madrid has the highest no. of Champions League Titles & Goals Link to GitHub Repository
